bibl.title: Sull'unde del PSorb. inv. 2069 (lin. 84-87). Il modello di un de accentibus? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: In-depth examination of P. Sorb. Inv. 2069 verso = C.L.A. V, 698 = C.P.L. 276 = C. Gloss. Biling. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 3006; LDAB 5438), 84-87, through the parallel with the tradition known by the Late Antiquity's grammatical Artes, with regard to the accentual dimension of the word unde.
bibl.seg: Scappaticcio Maria Chiara, Sull'unde del PSorb. inv. 2069 (lin. 84-87). Il modello di un de accentibus? Avec résumé en anglais.

In-depth examination of P. Sorb. Inv. 2069 verso = C.L.A. V, 698 = C.P.L. 276 = C. Gloss. Biling. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 3006; LDAB 5438), 84-87, through the parallel with the tradition known by the Late Antiquity's grammatical Artes, with regard to the accentual dimension of the word unde.
